raw_mentions: The Kd of VEGF binding to VEGFR1 and VEGFR2 is 15-100 μM and 400-800 μM, respectively (Terman et al., 1994).
The Kd of VEGF binding to VEGFR1 and VEGFR2 is 15-100 μM and 400-800 μM, respectively (Terman et al., 1994).

Based on our in silico analysis of the ErbB cell signaling pathway, we identified the ErbB 1 binding molecule as the high affinity binding site with a low dissociation constant KD<1 nM, but which is not irreversible.
